title: Plat mid/adc LF High plat ranked team+
body:
Hi ! 

My name is Matt, I'm 21 and looking for a high plat + ranked team to play in as a starting role.( I'm looking for a team that practice's most weekday's and plays in online tournaments on the weekend)
I am currently sub for Girth squad(AuRa) which we are currently diamond 5 on the ranked 5's ladder.
I practice both adc and mid every day.
I'm currently plat 4 in season 5. 

If you would like to discuss further about trialing me, 

My IGN is Mattelelelel

replies.body:
would recommend great sub adc for when our adc was in america 
made getting to diamond easy mode
